text_block_list.text: It was a day when Maruzensky wanted to work on her dancing and had allowed me to observe—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: One, two… finish♪
Maruzensky danced perfectly to the song she had only just learned.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Whooo… That felt good! Getting into the rhythm comes easy with that zippy beat♪
choice_data_list: That was fun to watch, too.
It was fun to watch, too.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Gosh, trainer, I can see your eyes twinkling… Just like when we first met. Hmhm, you're kind of making me blush.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Gosh, trainer, I can see your eyes twinkling… Just like when we first met. Hmhm, you're making me blush a little.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But, I'm glad you enjoyed it! That's what we're about, right? Enjoying things♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Dancing or racing, you better have a blast while you're at it!
(School bell rings…)

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … My, is it that late already? Let's leave the dancing here. I gotta skitty before I miss it.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Aah, you wanna know～? Haha, it's not like I'm not going on a date!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: No, actually, a car manufacturer is having an exhibition… and guess what!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I heard you can get a miniature version of my lovely Tacchan! It sounds so cute! I want it so much!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: They're handing them out from 7:00 p.m. and there's a limited number, so I need to go get in line early!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Yep. Sorry for the rush. I'll see you tomorrow, trainer—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Yeah. I'm sorry for the rush. See you tomorrow, trainer—

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Ah, Marzen! I'm so glad to see you～!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh my, girls! What's going on?

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: You were just practicing your dancing, right?! We really wanted to watch…!

text_block_list.name: Junior Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: We heard from our teacher that your dancing's stupid good and we could learn a lot from it… so please!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh dearie… Hehe, I can't say no to a request like that, can I?♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: It's fine. There's no substitute for the smiles on those cute little faces. Come then, watch me carefully!
It seems Maruzensky has decided to continue with the dance lesson for the younger students.
Remembering the excited look on Maruzensky's face earlier… I decided to search up the exhibition hall and go get one myself.
—And the next day.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Alright, another lively day of training awaits♪ I'm raring to go! What do I—
choice_data_list: Before we start, here's something for you.
Before we go, I got you something.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Eh… that's…!?
I placed the miniature car on the palm of my hand and showed it to Maruzensky.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Whaaaa!? Trainer… did you go all the way to the venue to get me one?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Whaaaa!? Trainer… did you go all the way to the venue to get me one?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wasn't it pretty far? And the line must have been long?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: You went through all this trouble because of what I said yesterday…
choice_data_list: I just wanted you to be happy.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: You went through all this trouble because of what I said yesterday…
choice_data_list: I just wanted you to be happy.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Trainer…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Trainer…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: … Yeah, totally! This makes me so, sooo happy! Thank you!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I know! Do you have time after training? I want to thank you for the minicar.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… Let's enjoy some adult time together♪
—After training, we went for a drive in Maruzensky's beloved car.
With the cool night wind blowing, I spent some fearfu — err, adult times…
